name: Please Defeat the Bundesclown
description:
There is a Bundesclown. Please defeat it.

Created for 20 Second Game Jam by 3 Halves Games. Credits:

  • Gameplay, Music, UI Art: @marimodev
  • Character, CG Art: @gelatobear

Game features:

  • Customizable characters!
  • Multiple (3) endings!
  • Jammin' music!
  • Slick UI!
  • Only 20 seconds to play an entire run!

Thank you for playing our game. Be sure to check out all the other entries to the jam.  If you liked this, why not join our Discord as well? We'd love to chat with you about your potential triumphs over the Bundesclown. We wish you the best on your quest.
